rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Lounge
rooms.description: A spacious entrance with a built-in display area that leads to a living lounge. Designed following Chettinad architectural style using traditional motifs.

rooms.name: Open Kitchen and Dining Area
rooms.description: An integrated kitchen and dining space with Chettinad aesthetics featuring natural stone finishes. Open plan ensures connectivity to the lounge.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom & Bathroom
rooms.description: The master bedroom is designed with traditional elements and includes an attached bathroom ensuring privacy and comfort.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A compact guest room placed in a corner to maintain privacy following Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: A wide entrance door aligned in the auspicious direction as per Vastu norms.
Large windows with traditional wooden frames ensuring ample natural light and ventilation.
A sliding garage door for the two-car garage attached to the ground floor.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: A dedicated gym area designed with functional space and soundproofing, incorporating traditional Chettinad finishes.

rooms.name: Library/Study Room
rooms.description: A serene library/study space with ample natural light and built-in shelves. The layout respects Vastu guidelines for concentration.

openings.description: A small balcony attached to the library providing natural ventilation and an outdoor view.
Windows designed for adequate lighting in the private gym area.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom with En-suite Bathroom
rooms.description: An additional guest bedroom on the top floor includes an en-suite bathroom for added privacy and convenience.

rooms.name: Service/Utility Area
rooms.description: A service area used for storage or laundry that adheres to Vastu principles by being placed in the north-east direction.

openings.description: Well-placed windows ensuring ample daylight and cross ventilation as per Vastu norms.
